# Workflow name:
name: build

# Workflow triggers:
on:
  workflow_dispatch:

# Workflow jobs:
jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    env:
      SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL: ${{ secrets.SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL }}
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v1
        with:
          node-version: 15
      - name: Install production and development dependencies
        id: install
        uses: nick-invision/retry@v2
        with:
          timeout_minutes: 2
          max_attempts: 3
          command: npm install
      - name: Run tests
        id: tests
        uses: nick-invision/retry@v2
        with:
          timeout_minutes: 3
          max_attempts: 2
          command: npm test
      - uses: act10ns/slack@v1
        with:
          status: ${{ job.status }}
          steps: ${{ toJson(steps) }}
          channel: '#npm-ci'
        if: failure()
